title: [Large-scale] Educational Digital Game Design and Evaluation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Social science problem-solving methods, basic digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Gamification-based project execution utilizing learners' personally owned digital devices.

learning_goals: Develop one prototype of a social studies problem-solving digital game by applying an educational game design model.
Map game objectives and learning objectives according to four categories: knowledge transfer, skill acquisition, attitude change, and problem-solving.
Revise and improve a game design plan based on peer feedback to produce final presentation materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
